title: Did Worlds master pass mission "Cool Under Pressure"
body: I did the mission "Cool Under Pressure" where your team has to get first blood, first turret and kill 2 dragons and win the game which my team did. Yet the mission still says its incomplete. Plz help riot I don't want to have to do this mission again

replies.body: Looks like you just posted this about 10 min ago, try refreshing your client and waiting just a bit for that match to be fully uploaded to our servers. It may just be taking a moment for the game to properly recorded and update the mission. If you still don't see the progress update, try to shoot me a screenshot or highlight or something showing where you did all of the objectives of the mission.
